chapters.name: Ray Optics and Optical Instruments
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 2 Chapter 9 Ray Optics and Optical Instruments solutions. Reflection of Light by Spherical Mirrors, Refraction, Total Internal Reflection, Refraction through a Prism, Refraction at Spherical Surfaces and by Lenses, Optical Instruments.

chapters.name: Wave Optics
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 2 Chapter 10 Wave Optics solutions. Refraction and Reflection of Plane Waves using Huygens Principle, Huygens Principle, Refraction of Plane Waves, Interference of Light Waves and Young's Experiment.

chapters.name: Dual Nature of Radiation and Matter
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 2 Chapter 11 Dual Nature of Radiation and Matter solutions. Photoelectric Effect, Photon Nature of Light.

chapters.name: Atoms
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 2 Chapter 12 Atoms solutions. Alpha-particle Scattering and Rutherford's Nuclear Model of Atom, Bohr Model of the Hydrogen Atom, Hydrogen Spectrum, Bohr's Explanation of de Broglie's Hypothesis.

chapters.name: Nuclei
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 2 Chapter 13 Nuclei solutions. Mass-Energy and Nuclear Binding Energy, Nuclear Fission, Nuclear Fusion, Size of the Nucleus, Nuclear Reactions.

chapters.name: Semiconductor Electronics: Materials, Devices and Simple Circuits
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 2 Chapter 14 Semiconductor Electronics: Materials, Devices and Simple Circuits solutions. n-type Semiconductor, p-type Semiconductor, Energy Bands, p-n Junction, p-n Junction Diode, Rectifiers.
